channel.title: Need help with 823 model decoder
channel.description:
Hey guys i could really really really use your help... I downloaded a client that came pre-loaded with an 823 model decoder that suppose to let me use all models up to 823 revision. Well it starts up just fine, but when i go to spawn tectonic body or even tetsu platebody the client crashes on me and give me this error:
[code] Error: acx.aa() akm.gf() mj.u() xp.d() ki.f() pf.jw() | RsByteBuffer.readUnsigne dByte:135 Player.sendAppearence:204 Class297.decodePlayerMasks:149 Class82_Sub7. decodePlayersMasks:92 Class247.decodePlayerUpdate:133 PacketsDecoder.method4548: 2202 Class247.method2370:233 Class126.method1407:211 client.method2806:2813 clie nt.method2773:607 Class291.method2764:534 Class291.method2759:375 Class291.run:3 23 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 53 | 96,135, 135 59,2846,3537 -64,127,-12,-112,-75,64,0,0,-1,-1,0,-109,-55,-102,-74,-99,119,0 ,-98,22,-98,12,0,-109,-49,0,-99,80,-106,-52,0,0,0,0,3,16,16,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,5,-110 ,76,101,108,111, java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect0(Unknown Sou rce) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Sour ce) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream0(Unknown S ource) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URL.openStream(Unknown Source) at IPAddress.method6062(IPAddress.java:127) at Class247.method2370(Class247.java:246) at Class126.method1407(Class126.java:211) at client.method2806(client.java:2813) at client.method2773(client.java:607) at Class291.method2764(Class291.java:534) at Class291.method2759(Class291.java:375) at Class291.run(Class291.java:323) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
i also get this error when i try to run any other source other than the Rune-Elevation source i usually use. So what am i doing wrong? what am i not doing? any help will be much much appreciated, thx ahead of time : )
NOTE: its a 718/742 source if that helps any, and the client is the Foxtrot 718 client just changed to be able to load 823 models.

item.title: Need help with 823 model decoder
item.dc:creator: @defenderxvi defenderxvi
item.description:

Hey guys i could really really really use your helpâ€¦ I downloaded a client that came pre-loaded with an 823 model decoder that suppose to let me use all models up to 823 revision. Well it starts up just fine, but when i go to spawn tectonic body or even tetsu platebody the client crashes on me and give me this error:
